title: Which is best website worth checking website? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are the top 4 websites worth/calculator sites… My Site Wealth Number one is ‘my site wealth’ It is much better and Reliable site than other sites. It will help you to find out better website statistics. it is an absolutely free site to calculate your website worth/value. With the help of this site, you can see real statistics of your website such as domain age, Global traffic rank, estimated worth of your website, daily income PageRank, even threats. Siteworthtraffic In this list number 2 is siteworthtraffic, it is another best website worth calculator site available on the internet, this is also trustworthy and reliable website to check out the actual value of your website. Like mysitewealth it is also equipped with many advanced tools. Such as Alexa ranking, daily pageviews, daily income of your website etc. Webuka Number 3 is Webuka, Webuka is also equipped with all essential features. It will help you to find out the actual value of your website. With the help of Webuka, you can see all other details of your website such as Alexa ranking keyword, Google page ranking, website speed and value of your website. Siteprice Number 4 is URL Rate. Using this site you can calculate your website worth. It is pretty simple just you until your domain name and hit that lockup button it will start collecting data from several search engine, Alexa ranking, Google page ranking etc. To know more please visit this link website worth.

Most of the website worth/valuation tools out there aren't helpful. They scrape for meaningless data and then try to extrapolate a value out of that. The real problem is that the creators of those tools have NO IDEA what websites are worth because they aren't in the industry! I'm a partner at Empire Flippers - we successfully negotiated hundreds of deals worth more than $4.5M in 2015 alone. We thought we could do better so we created a Valuation Tool that actually works: How Much Is My Website Worth? Website Valuation Tool - Empire Flippers The difference here is that we ACTUALLY use this tool to list (and sell) the websites and online businesses that are placed with us. As we sell more than 90% of listings, this tool is pretty accurate.
